description: You can swap the choc chips for cranberries, smarties or something else you enjoy.
name: Chewy Choc Chip Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat Oven to 160°C (140°C fan forced) and prepare two cookie trays.
Melt butter in the microwave. Add to large bowl. Add brown sugar and caster sugar to large bowl. Mix until smooth.
Lightly beat egg then add to large bowl. Add vanilla essence to large bowl, stir until combined.
Sift flours and baking powder into small bowl. Gradually add flour mix to large bowl. Mix with a wooden spoon. Add choc chips and mix through.
Make balls of dough using a tablespoon and place on tray leaving space for cookies to spread out.
Cook in oven for approx 10-12 mins, until lightly browned.
Allow to cool for approximately 5 min on tray before moving to cooling rack
